nodes.bodyText: I don't think this is a correct label but we'll address accessibility in another task, so it's ok I think.
It seems this condition doesn't work. The whole page is reloaded every time when the form is saved, regardless if the locale changed.
Could you please extend the test a bit? We need to be sure i18n works on the Welcome Screen as well.
